name: Snow Bells
description:
Use your mouse!
Click to start!

I didn't have a lot of time to work on this and I'm new to gamejams, so I decided to just practice by creating a take on the old flash game, Winterbells. I always loved it's peaceful, simplistic nature and considering you have to jump through hoops to play a flash game, I thought why not recreate it

I added some challenge and variance as you progress. Hope you enjoy!

Maybe the best part of the original was the music. I lack the talent and time to come up with something so great, but found a great track by Scott Holmes.
